/>
XIII.i.4.C.1.k
.
SC for Dental Treatment – Extracted Teeth from Chronic Periodontal Disease
38 CFR 3.381(g)
states that teeth extracted because of chronic periodontal disease may be SC for treatment purposes if they were extracted after 180 days or more of active service, per
38 U.S.C. 1712
.
title: M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 4, Section C - Ratings for Dental Treatment Purposes
citation: Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 4, Section C
